title: Bright and quiet unit situated in prime Century City
map_address: Fox Hills Dr near Pico Blvd
posting_body: Natural lights are filled up in each room, and the living room with direct access to a private balcony.
Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample cabinetry for storage.
Both bedrooms with large windows, walk in closet, en-suite bathroom with glass shower, soaker tub and dual vanity.
Additional features include Miele washer/dryer side by side in unit, built ins, two tandem parking spaces and additional guest parking.
Accessible neighborhood, Rancho Park Golf, Westfield Century City, numberless shopping and dining options!
To request a showing reply with the date and time you would like to see the unit and the best number to reach you so we can confirm the appointment
century city, luxury condo, rancho park, santa monica, Brentwood , Westwood
